title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, June 18, 2020
description: On this day in 1983, Dr. Sally Ride became the first American woman in space. She said, “I’m sure it was the most fun I’ll ever have in my life.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1983, Dr. Sally Ride became the first American woman in space. She said, “I’m sure it was the most fun I’ll ever have in my life.”
